column8: he was a son of the late harold and ruth (campbell) obrien. he was a retired service manager for the former morrow motors
column9: chuck smith and beglin motors. he was member of the new galilee v. f. w. he is survived by his wife of 61 years
column10: susan m. ( butler ) obrien; a son
column12: ellwood city; a daughter and son-in-law
column16: alex obrien and eric mc. call; a brother
column19: dorrie parody and her husband tom
column21: pittsburgh and numerous nieces and nephews. he was preceded in death by a brother
column22: jim cartwright. friends will be received monday from 2 to 4 and 6 to 8 p. m. in the hill and kunselman funeral home
column27: where a service will be held tuesday at 11:00 a. m. entombment will follow in sylvania hills mausoleum
